page.title: 17Services in Langtoft 2
page.content: Julie Dowson is Langtoft's qualified {Hairdresser.}Her shop is on Front Street and it is called Hairways. The shop opens at 9.00 every morning. She is closed on Saturday,Sunday,and Monday.Julie has different closing times at night.Three quarters of her customers come from Langtoft.Julie gets roughly 16 people a day.She can do any style you want. Mrs Richardson owns the{Post Office. Her shop is down Front Street.Mrs Richardson sells anything from cigarettes to loaves of bread.She has a busy day on Thursday because on that day people go for pensions.The Post Office opens at 9.00 and closes at 5.30 with a hour for lunch.
